item.title: 第三季度报告强劲，电信巨头 America Movil 股价攀升
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 公布了强劲的第三季度业绩，该公司股价在周三早盘交易中大涨 2%。【原文：Shares in Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil jumped 2% in Wednesday morning trading after the company reported strong results in the third quarter.】

item.title: 花旗银行从富国银行聘请戴维斯担任北美地区增长股权主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团已从富国银行聘请了股票资本市场银行家 Cully Davis 担任其北美成长型股票部门的主管。【原文：Citigroup has hired equity capital markets banker Cully Davis from Wells Fargo as the head of its growth equity unit in North America, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: PIMCO 称英国预算不太可能震撼市场，金边债券看起来很有吸引力
item.description: 全球资产管理公司 PIMCO 的高级管理人员表示，英国新政府在本月的首份预算案中不太可能令投资者感到不安，其债务前景也比金融市场似乎认为的更为乐观。【原文：Britain's new government is unlikely to upset investors in its first budget this month and the outlook for its debt is more positive than financial markets appear to believe, senior executives from global asset manager PIMCO said.】

item.title: 消息称阿联酋航空订购更多波音 777F 货机
item.description: 业内人士称，世界上最大的货运航空公司之一--迪拜阿联酋航空正在扩充其波音 777F 货机机队，以应对货运量的急剧增长。【原文：Dubai's Emirates, one of the world's largest cargo carriers, is expanding its fleet of Boeing 777F freighters as it plans for sharp growth in cargo traffic, industry sources said.】

item.title: 美国为小型核反应堆申请 9 亿美元资金
item.description: 美国于本周三开放了高达 9 亿美元的资金申请，以支持小型模块化反应堆核技术在国内的初步部署。【原文：The U.S. on Wednesday opened applications for up to $900 million in funding to support the initial domestic deployment of small modular reactor nuclear technology.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，贝莱德正与印度 Jio Financial 商谈成立私人信贷企业事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德正在与穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实集团（Reliance Group）旗下的吉奥金融服务公司（Jio Financial Services）洽谈成立一家私人信贷企业。【原文：BlackRock , the world's biggest asset manager, is in talks with Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Group firm Jio Financial Services to set up a private credit venture, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会（IATA）负责人称空客和波音飞机交付延迟情况未见好转
item.description: 全球航空机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）负责人周三表示，空客和波音两家飞机制造商的交货延误 "令人非常沮丧"，而且仍未得到改善。【原文：Delivery delays from planemakers Airbus and Boeing are "massively frustrating" and are not yet getting better, the head of the global airline body IATA said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 经过长达一年的狂热之后，美国第三季度能源交易额降至 120 亿美元
item.description: 分析公司 Enverus 周三表示，在长达一年的合并浪潮掏空了腰包，使美国顶级页岩油田可供收购的公司数量减少之后，上一季度美国石油公司的兼并急剧放缓。【原文：U.S. oil mergers slowed sharply last quarter after a year-long consolidation wave emptied pocketbooks and left fewer companies on offer in the top U.S. shale field, analytics firm Enverus said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 股东组织称，ASML 提前公布财报是 "人为错误
item.description: 周三，一群荷兰股东对芯片设备制造商 ASML 意外提前公布其第三季度财报表示失望，但也对他们所谓的 "人为错误 "表示同情。【原文：A group of Dutch shareholders on Wednesday reacted with dismay to chip equipment maker's ASML's accidental early publication of its third-quarter earnings, but were also sympathetic to what they called a "human mistake."】

item.title: 光子初创公司 Lightmatter 在人工智能数据中心热潮中融资 4 亿美元，下一步计划上市
item.description: 总部位于加利福尼亚州山景城的初创公司 Lightmatter 正在开发数据中心网络芯片中的光子技术，该公司周三表示，已在 D 轮融资中筹集了 4 亿美元，估值达 44 亿美元。【原文：Lightmatter, a Mountain View, California-headquartered startup building photonic tech in datacenter networking chips, said on Wednesday it has raised $400 million in a Series D funding round at a valuation of $4.4 billion.】

item.title: 亚马逊历经多年研发后推出首款彩色 Kindle 电子书阅读器
item.description: 亚马逊经过多年努力，终于在本周三发布了首款彩色 Kindle 电子阅读器。【原文：Amazon on Wednesday announced its first color Kindle e-reader following years of effort to bring the more immersive device to market.】

item.title: 亚马逊公司加入推动核电发展的行列，以满足数据中心的需求
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三表示，它已签署了三份关于开发被称为小型模块化反应堆的核电技术的协议，成为最新一家推动开发新能源以满足数据中心激增的电力需求的大型科技公司。【原文：Amazon.com said on Wednesday it has signed three agreements on developing the nuclear power technology called small modular reactors, becoming the latest big tech company to push for new sources to meet surging electricity demand from data centers.】

item.title: 科三集团董事长表示短期内不会出售淡水河谷股份
item.description: 本周三发表的一篇采访援引巴西企业集团 Cosan 董事长鲁本斯-奥梅托（Rubens Ometto）的话说，Cosan 不打算在短期内出售其在矿业公司淡水河谷（Vale）的股份。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate Cosan is not looking to sell its stake in miner Vale in the short term, Chairman Rubens Ometto was quoted as saying in an interview published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 9 月份美国进口价格创九个月来最大降幅
item.description: 由于能源产品和食品成本下降，9 月份美国进口价格创下 9 个月来最大降幅，这对国内通胀前景是个好兆头。【原文：U.S. import prices fell by the most in nine months in September amid decreases in the costs of energy products and food, which bodes well for the domestic inflation outlook.】

item.title: 马斯克的 SpaceX 公司起诉加州专家组，指控其在火箭发射问题上存在政治偏见
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）在联邦法院起诉了加利福尼亚州的一个委员会，指控委员会成员存在政治偏见，阻止这家太空风险投资公司增加从该州美国空军基地发射火箭的数量。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk’s SpaceX has sued a California commission in federal court, accusing panel members of political bias in blocking the space venture company from increasing the number of rockets it launches from a U.S. air base in the state.】

item.title: 通用汽车将出资 6.25 亿美元与 Lithium Americas 成立新的合资公司
item.description: 加拿大矿商美洲锂业公司（Lithium Americas）周三表示，通用汽车公司将向其新成立的合资企业出资 6.25 亿美元，用于开发位于内华达州的 Thacker Pass 项目。【原文：Canadian miner Lithium Americas said on Wednesday General Motors will contribute $625 million to their new joint venture for developing the Thacker Pass project in Nevada.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会通过 "点击取消 "规则打击订阅陷阱
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周三通过了一项最终规则，要求企业在取消订阅和会员资格时必须像注册一样方便，这是该机构在 11 月 5 日大选前的最后一项重要规则制定工作。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission adopted a final rule on Wednesday requiring businesses to make it as easy to cancel subscriptions and memberships as it is to sign up, in the agency's last major rulemaking before the Nov. 5 election.】

item.title: 对美国降息和大选持谨慎态度，亚洲债券流入放缓
item.description: 9 月份，亚洲债券市场连续第五个月吸引了海外投资，但由于对美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）进一步降息的预期减弱以及美国大选前的谨慎态度，资金流入速度有所放缓。【原文：Asian bond markets attracted overseas investments for the fifth consecutive month in September, though the pace of inflows slowed due to diminished expectations for further rate cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve and caution ahead of U.S. elections.】

item.title: 雅培因医疗器械销售强劲而上调利润预期
item.description: 雅培实验室周三小幅上调了全年盈利预期，此前由于血糖监测产品和其他医疗设备需求强劲，雅培实验室的季度盈利超出了华尔街的预期。【原文：Abbott Laboratories slightly lifted its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, after beating Wall Street estimates for quarterly earnings on strong demand for its glucose-monitoring products and other medical devices.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利交易大增，利润猛增 32
item.description: 摩根士丹利第三季度利润激增 32%，这主要得益于交易量的回升，而交易量的回升也使其竞争对手受到提振，因此摩根士丹利的股价在开盘前上涨了 3%。【原文：Morgan Stanley's third-quarter profit surged 32%, fueled by a rebound in dealmaking that had also buoyed its rivals, sending its shares up 3% before the market open.】

item.title: 英美烟草公司将推出合成尼古丁小袋
item.description: 英美烟草公司总裁大卫-沃特菲尔德（David Waterfield）周三表示，英美烟草公司将在美国推出使用合成尼古丁的 Velo 尼古丁袋。【原文：British American Tobacco will launch a version of its Velo nicotine pouches using synthetic nicotine in the United States, David Waterfield, President of the company's U.S. subsidiary Reynolds American said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，火灾发生后，自由港公司将把印尼铜矿销售推迟至 2025 年第二季度
item.description: 两位知情人士称，由于新冶炼厂发生火灾导致生产进一步推迟，美国铜矿商自由港麦克莫兰公司将把从印尼销售精炼铜的时间推迟到 2025 年第二季度。【原文：U.S. copper miner Freeport McMoRan will postpone its sales of refined copper from Indonesia until the second quarter of 2025 as a fire at its new smelter causes a further production delay, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 雀巢新任首席执行官可能会在新的起点上削减指导性目标，一些投资者发出警告
item.description: 一些分析师和投资者认为，雀巢可能会利用新任首席执行官洛朗-弗莱克西（Laurent Freixe）在未来几个月提供的新起点，在连续几个月销售量疲软之后，今年第二次下调财务指导。【原文：Nestle could use the fresh start provided by new CEO Laurent Freixe in the coming months to lower financial guidance for the second time this year following months of weak sales volumes, according to some analysts and investors.】

item.title: 欧洲航空公司为飞机交付延误而苦恼
item.description: 欧洲航空公司正在努力应对空客和波音两家飞机制造商推迟交付飞机的问题，他们在周三的一次会议上表示，尽管廉价航空公司瑞安航空（Ryanair）指出，运力限制将有利于机票定价。【原文：European airlines are grappling with delivery delays from planemakers Airbus and Boeing , they said at a conference on Wednesday, although budget carrier Ryanair noted the capacity constraints would be good for ticket pricing.】

item.title: 市场等待银行财报，期指持稳，纳指走高
item.description: 由于投资者在等待摩根士丹利和其他银行的季度业绩，道指和 S&P 500 指数期货周三保持稳定，而纳斯达克 100 指数期货在前一交易日科技股和石油股大跌后小幅上涨。【原文：Dow and S&P 500 futures remained steady on Wednesday, while Nasdaq 100 futures rose slightly following a tech and oil stock selloff in the previous session, as investors awaited quarterly results from Morgan Stanley and other banks.】

item.title: 早间竞价：英镑暴跌，ASML曲线救国令股市目瞪口呆
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: Accel 称，2024 年美国、欧洲和以色列的人工智能和云计算融资将达到 790 亿美元
item.description: 风险投资公司 Accel 周三在一份报告中称，美国、欧洲和以色列的人工智能和云计算公司的融资额在经历了三年的下降后正在上升，预计到今年年底将达到 792 亿美元。【原文：Funding of artificial intelligence and cloud companies in the U.S., Europe and Israel is rising after three years of decline and is estimated to hit $79.2 billion by the end of the year, venture capital firm Accel said in a report on Wednesday.】

item.title: 宝洁公司将公布不温不火的收入增长报告
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）周五将公布季度收入增长乏力的报告。作为汰渍洗涤剂、道恩洗洁精和帮宝适纸尿裤的供应商，宝洁在美国和中国这两个最大的市场上面临着价格竞争。【原文：Procter & Gamble is set to report muted quarterly revenue growth on Friday. The purveyor of Tide detergent, Dawn dish soap and Pampers diapers faces rivals competing on price in its two biggest markets, the United States and China.】

item.title: 汉莎航空称，为了公平竞争，所有飞往欧洲的航班都必须避开俄罗斯
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）周三表示，欧洲需要确保飞往欧洲大陆的航空公司避开俄罗斯领空，以便为该行业提供一个公平竞争的环境。【原文：Europe needs to ensure that airlines flying into the continent avoid Russian airspace to provide a level playing field in the industry, German airline group Lufthansa said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司将在国防和航天领域裁员多达 2500 人
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三证实了法新社的报道，称空中客车公司计划在其防务与航天部门裁减多达2500个职位。【原文：Airbus plans to cut up to 2,500 posts in its Defence & Space division, a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday, confirming an AFP report.】
